title: Orderhub dashboard component schema
$comment: This is an extension of @schematics/angular component schematic with displayBlock:false, inlineStyle:false, style:scss, skipSelector:false, flat:false

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. By default, a folder with the same name as the component is created under '<the project>/src/app' and used as the path.
